## Getting and Cleaning Data Course Project

### The purpose of this project is to demonstrate your ability to collect, work with, and clean a data set.

Data for the project can be accessed via this link : https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip

Description of the data can be obtained here: http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Human+Activity+Recognition+Using+Smartphones

### Files submitted for the assignment:

1. Codebook.md containing descriptions of the variables and the work performed to clean up the data.

2. run_analysis.R containing the script for tidying the dataset.

3. SecondData.txt which contains the final tidy dataset.
